https://anshraj112.medium.com/the-first-: Ansh Raj used to think FOMO was just internet hype, until he saw a Scaler School of Technology reel.  He was rejected from Scaler in 2023 and watching the kids build startups, write code, and solve problems while he's stuck learning outdated engineering concepts lit a fire of regret. His college is teaching irrelevant things and giving him academic déjà vu, so he's teaching himself what he needs to know. Even though he didn't get in, and despite the broken system he's working in, he's determined to keep learning, building, and maybe even surpass those who had it easier. Ultimately, he doesn't care about getting perfect grades to look good on paper because he's focused on real skills.

Subject: Feeling the FOMO... But Finding My Fire! 🔥

Hey everyone,

This week's blog post is all about the burn of FOMO (Fear of Missing Out) and turning that feeling into fuel!

Here's the gist:

*   **The Struggle is Real:** Author Ansh Raj shares a raw and honest take on the frustrations of a traditional engineering education. Feeling stuck in outdated curriculum while seeing others thrive.
*   *Facing Rejection:** Being rejected from a dream opportunity (Scaler School of Technology) and seeing others succeed there sparks deep-seated regrets.
*   **Turning Pain into Power:** Despite the challenges, Ansh is choosing to use these feelings as motivation to keep learning, building, and pushing forward. It's about making his own way, even if it's messy!

**Key takeaway:** Don't let FOMO paralyze you. Use it to ignite your passion and create your own path!

Read the full post here [link to the blog post] and let us know what you think!
